headline: Save a day every
subtext: Automation should feel like a teammate for everyone. Let SaveADay handle the repeat work so you can focus on people, ideas, and rest.

week.label: This week
week.summary: Trade one chaotic day for flow time. Share it with your crew, your community, or yourself.
ideas: Host a listening session with the folks closest to your customers.
Block one morning for thinking without notifications or back-to-back calls.

month.label: This month
month.summary: Unlock a long weekend every month without burning PTO or goodwill.
ideas: Invest in team rituals that invite every voice into the roadmap.
Use the extra hours to support someone who rarely gets unblocked.

year.label: This year
year.summary: Take back almost two months. Recharge, mentor, or finally launch the idea everyone asked for.
ideas: Plan a proper break for the whole team, not just the loudest voices.
Prototype a community-led feature or program you have been postponing.
